Method Detail

addExtension

public static java.io.File addExtension(java.io.File f,
                                        java.lang.String newExt)
Add an extension to the filename of a File object. If an extension is already present then it is not modified.

Parameters:
f - The file to have its extension modified
newExt - The new extension to be added e.g. ".pov"
Returns:
A new file object with a possibly different file extension

changeExtension

public static java.io.File changeExtension(java.io.File f,
                                           java.lang.String newExt)
Set the extension of the filename of a File object. If an extension is already present then it is replaced by the one specified.

Parameters:
f - The file to have its extension modified
newExt - The new extension to be given e.g. ".pov"
Returns:
A new file object with the name having the specified extension
